page.title: 07WEST DURRINGTON ESTATE
page.content: The Draft Plan for W.Durrington prepared by Worthing Borough Council in 1980 comments "Worthing is already a densely developed town and has major constraints on further developments .. There is however one remaining part of the town where there is still considerable scope ... this is in the northwest at Durrington ... identified as being suitable." This estate is reported to be the fastest growing development along the south coast. 800 acres are earmarked and it is planned to build 1350 dwelling units eventually. When complete the estate will house 10,000 people. A POPULAR PLACE TO LIVE Our survey showed that while 35% of the residents had previoulsy lived in Worthing the other 65% had moved from all over the UK and from beyond.
